Antonio L. Apolinario Jr.

Professor

Computer Science Department
Graphics Graphics Lab

Federal University of Bahia

publications research teaching contact cv home

My research and teaching are in Computer Graphics, centered around modeling and rendering methods and algorithms. I got my Ph.D. from PESC/COPPE/UFRJ in 2004, working at Computer Graphics Laboratory . From 2004 to 2006 I held a research position at National Laboratory for Scientific Computing (LNCC). I was a professor in Computer Engineering Couse in UEFS between 2007 and 2010. In 2010 I joined the Department of Computer Science at UFBA . Nowadays I am also a permanent professor in Computer Science Program.
